title: Learning Design for Complex Systems Using Computer Modeling Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and understanding of linguistic structures
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, learners are office/administrative professionals with advanced language proficiency

learning_goals: Learners can simulate and represent the operating principles of complex systems using computer modeling tools
They can select learning methods aligned with their personal learning styles by comparing advantages/disadvantages of integrated vs. segmented instructional materials
Through project-based assessments, learners can demonstrate the efficiency of modeling tools in solving real-world language problems

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
